examples.example: 老师在课堂上强调了这部分内容是重点，需要我们特别注意。

translate.english: The teacher emphasized in class that this part of the content is the key point and requires our special attention.

examples.example: 这次会议明确了工作的重点，大家都充满了信心去努力完成任务。

translate.english: This meeting clarified the key points of the work, and everyone is full of confidence to strive to complete the task.

examples.example: 学习时要抓住重点，这样才能事半功倍。

translate.english: When studying, we should grasp the key points so that we can achieve twice the result with half the effort.
